TopicTitle: The Challenge without a Proper Name

Articles.Content: Build a spaceship that can enter Eve's atmosphere and fly around as a plane, then get back to Kerbin without ever touching the surface of Eve. No mods are allowed except KAC and similar. The debug menu is not allowed. Ion engines can be used, solid fuel engines can be used, liquid fuel engines can be used. There must be a kerbal in ship ship, however this doesn't restrict probe cores. Science can be collected freely, and contracts can be completed on the way. You must have a video of the descent into the atmosphere and the ascent to orbit. They can be separate videos. You can never touch the ground.
